name: useGrid
label: Use Grid Drawing
description:
Enabling this draws vertical and horizontal lines surrounding each node.
Output also contains them.

name: useArrayInput
label: Use Array Input
description:
Enable this to use array input instead of json input.
Like this below,
5, 0, 10...

name: useAutoSave
label: Use Auto Save
description:
Enable this to auto save input and retrieve it later.
This saves it in the localStorage.

name: useAutoFormat
label: Use Auto Format
description:
Enabling this automatically formats the input given.
Whether it is json input or array input.

name: useImmediateDraw
label: Use Immediate Draw
description:
Enabling this draws the tree immediately.
Stops waiting for the user to finish input.

name: lineWidth
label: Set Line Width
description:
Set the thickness of the lines and edges.
Choose from 1 (default) to 10 (max) units.
Higher is better for large inputs.

name: nodeSize
label: Set Node Size
description:
Set the size of the circles or nodes.
Choose from 1 (default) to 10 (max) units.
Higher is better for large inputs.

name: lineColor
label: Set Line Color
description:
Set the color of the lines and edges.
Consider the color contrast.

name: nodeColor
label: Set Node Color
description:
Set the color of the circles or nodes.
Consider the color contrast.

name: textColor
label: Set Text Color
description:
Set the color of the text value.
Consider the color contrast.

name: canvasColor
label: Set Canvas Color
description:
Set the color of the canvas.
Consider the color contrast.
